languages.text: {n}Упрямо глядя на вас, он цедит сквозь зубы:{/n} "Люди несовершенны, но не закон Его".
{n}Stubbornly looking at you, he says through gritted teeth,{/n} "Humans may be imperfect, but His Law is not."
languages.original_text: {n}Упрямо глядя на вас, он цедит сквозь зубы:{/n} "Люди несовершенны, но не закон Его".

traits.locale_text: {n}Stubbornly looking at you, he says through gritted teeth,{/n} "Humans may be imperfect, but His law is not."

{n}Stubbornly looking at you, he says through gritted teeth,{/n} "Humans may be imperfect, but His Law is not."

languages.text: {n}彼は頑固にあなたを見つめて、歯を食いしばりながら言った。{/n}「人間は不完全かもしれないが、陛下の法はそうではない」
languages.original_text: {n}Stubbornly looking at you, he says through gritted teeth,{/n} "Humans may be imperfect, but His Law is not."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は頑固にあなたを見つめて、歯を食いしばりながら言った。{/n}「人間は不完全かもしれないが、陛下の法はそうではない」

languages.text: {n}Den sturen Blick auf dich gerichtet, sagt er mit zusammengebissenen Zähnen:{/n} "Menschen sind vielleicht nicht perfekt, aber Sein Gesetz ist es schon."
languages.original_text: {n}Stubbornly looking at you, he says through gritted teeth,{/n} "Humans may be imperfect, but His Law is not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Den sturen Blick auf dich gerichtet, sagt er mit zusammengebissenen Zähnen:{/n} "Menschen sind vielleicht nicht perfekt, aber Sein Gesetz ist es schon."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne soutient votre regard avec défiance et marmonne, les dents serrées :{/n}« Les humains ne sont peut-être pas parfaits, mais Sa loi l'est. »
languages.original_text: {n}Stubbornly looking at you, he says through gritted teeth,{/n} "Humans may be imperfect, but His Law is not."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne soutient votre regard avec défiance et marmonne, les dents serrées :{/n}« Les humains ne sont peut-être pas parfaits, mais Sa loi l'est. »
{n}Solomorne soutient votre regard avec défiance et marmonne, les dents serrées :{/n}« Les humains ne sont peut-être pas parfaits, mais Sa loi l'est. »

languages.text: {n}El Arbitrator te mira con obstinación y responde con los dientes apretados:{/n} «Puede que los humanos no sean perfectos, pero Su ley sí lo es».
languages.original_text: {n}Stubbornly looking at you, he says through gritted teeth,{/n} "Humans may be imperfect, but His Law is not."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arbitrator te mira con obstinación y responde con los dientes apretados:{/n} «Puede que los humanos no sean perfectos, pero Su ley sí lo es».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙固执地看着你，咬牙切齿地开了口。{/n}“人类或许确实有瑕疵，但帝皇的律法是完美的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Stubbornly looking at you, he says through gritted teeth,{/n} "Humans may be imperfect, but His Law is not."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙固执地看着你，咬牙切齿地开了口。{/n}“人类或许确实有瑕疵，但帝皇的律法是完美的。”

languages.text: {n}İnatçı bir şekilde sana bakarken dişlerini gıcırtıyor.{/n} "İnsanlar kusurlu olabilir ancak O'nun Kanunu kusursuzdur."
languages.original_text: {n}Stubbornly looking at you, he says through gritted teeth,{/n} "Humans may be imperfect, but His Law is not."

traits.locale_text: {n}İnatçı bir şekilde sana bakarken dişlerini gıcırtıyor.{/n} "İnsanlar kusurlu olabilir ancak O'nun Yasası kusursuzdur."
{n}İnatçı bir şekilde sana bakarken dişlerini gıcırtarak,{/n} "İnsanlar kusurlu olabilir ancak O'nun kanunları öyle değil."
